description: This is a short hike in the Cape Breton Highlands National Park near Cape North in the Aspy Valley.  The Aspy Valley cuts across the highlands in a straight line which is really impressive.  The Beulach Ban Falls tumble down from the top of the highlands with an acadian type forest surroundings.  Very very close to the road so suitable for everyone.
directions: Cabot Trail into Cape North.  Continue towards Pleasant Bay and keep straight at 90 degree turn of the Cabo Trail.  there will be signing to the fall.
title: Beulach Ban Fall
